A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Last Jedi and rogue one is exactly what i\, a long time fan\, wanted to see with the Star Wars Fran chose franchise. Too many times have the films played it safe and being too much like one another\, expanding on nothing. Every scene was fresh\, and full of action wether it's love or lightsabers\, it kept me glued to the screen. If you want nostalgia\, go watch the old films. If you want something new\, start here.
